# Mothur

`Schloss, P.D., et al., Introducing mothur: Open-source, platform-independent,`
`community-supported software for describing and comparing microbial communities.`
`Appl Environ Microbiol, 2009. 75(23):7537-41.`

To run mothur, download from https://github.com/mothur/mothur/releases

If you keep it in your downloads folder, you can run it with the following command (in the terminal): 

```{bash eval=FALSE, include=T}
~/downloads/mothur/mothur
```
